	//
	function createSummary(pID){
		var body = $(pID).text();
		var summary = "";
		if(body.length <= 200) 
			summary = body;
		else 
			summary = body.substring(0, 200) + "...";
		
		$(pID).html(summary);
	}
	//  
  </head><!---->

                            « 
                              
                             
                           
                         
                        
                        
					  
 
                       
                         
                          
« 
                            
                              
                            
                           
                          
                         
                          

                            
                              
                             »
                           
                          
                        
 
                       
					  
                     
                    
                    
                   
                     
                       
                         
                          
                            
                            
                          

                            
                              
                             
                           
                          
                        
 
                           
                          
                        createSummary("#summary-");
